name: just a regular strategy game I think!?!
name_original: just a regular strategy game I think!?!
description: hello and welcome I made this game just for fun at first it had so many bugs but I kept working on it until I fixed the bugs and then I tried it out and it turned out to be a great game so I uploaded it basically it's a strategy game you need to build tanks and turrets to keep the building safe when some time passes it becomes harder and harder and to place tanks and turrets press on the hammer then click on the thing you want to place then press f on the keyboard you spawn with 1k cash and good luck!
